project.name: Apache Isis Core
project.description:
Core framework, providing metamodel, runtime and core APIs.
Also defines standard build process, as well as standard set of 3rd party dependencies (eg for testing and logging frameworks).

properties.license.additional-notes:
In addition, Isis uses some Javascript libraries: * Twitter Bootstrap, licensed under MIT [1] * Bootstrap-Growl (JQuery plugin), licensed under MIT license [2] * LiveQuery (JQuery plugin), licensed under MIT license [3] * Wicket Bootstrap, licenced under ASL 2 [4] * Bootstrap Datetimepicker, licenced under MIT licence [5] * Moment.js, licenced under MIT licence [6]
[1] https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/blob/master/LICENSE [2] https://github.com/mouse0270/bootstrap-growl/blob/master/LICENSE [3] https://github.com/brandonaaron/livequery#license [4] https://github.com/l0rdn1kk0n/wicket-bootstrap [5] https://github.com/Eonasdan/bootstrap-datetimepicker/blob/master/LICENSE [6] https://github.com/moment/moment/blob/develop/LICENSE

requirePluginVersions.message: All plugin versions must be defined!

properties.postDepListText:
The above (auto-generated) list aggregates the dependencies (either directly or transitively) of all the modules that make up ${project.name}. You can use mvn dependency:list or mvn dependency:tree to view dependencies by submodule.
${license.additional-notes}
